name: Leonard
description:
Leonard is a platformer game where you play as the main character (Leonard) who is a dog. The story takes place in some underground dungeon from which you have to escape. But that isn't easy as it is filled with obstacles and monsters that will try to stop you. The task is to get to the last level and finally go to the surface.

*Note* The enemies have been programed in a way so that they have different amount of Hp on every level so sometimes they will have one and next he will be unkillable.
